title: Zooniverse aggregation json schema
description: The aggregation scheme for Zooniverse aggregation results

instructions.description: a json object description each step of the workflow. Used to be able to map task ids to something meaningful

param.description: just to let us know that all of the params at this level (other than reserved keywords) are task ids

items.description: mapping from class id to floating value floating value associated with each class

[0-9]+.description: can be either percentage of people who chose a class or the probability of the class

items.description: total number of people who have classified this task/workflow/subject
